util.py¶

General python utilities, which aren’t necessary specific to Hylaa’s objects. Methods/Classes in this one shouldn’t require non-standard imports.

class hylaa.util.Freezable¶

An object whose attributes can be frozen (prevent new attributes from being created)

freeze_attrs()¶

Prevents any new attributes from being created in the object

hylaa.util.get_script_path(filename)¶

Returns the path of this script, pass in __file__ for the filename

Parameters

filename – name of script

Returns

the real path of script

hylaa.util.matrix_to_string(m)¶

Returns string representatiion of matrix

Parameters

m – matrix

Returns

string representation of matrix
